item.title: How do i make sum wildy?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“rofllewisrofl, post:4, topic:264730”][quote author=3d3r link=topic=349543.msg2686724#msg2686724 date=1235703283]
ne1 kno enkrona??? i want to make wildy outside edge bank ne1 help me???
[/quote]

Translation: Does anyone know enkrona? I want to make wildy outside edge bank can someone help me?[/quote]

Thank you,

[quote=“3d3r, post:3, topic:264730”]un enkripted??? lol… dude you kno there server enkrona.servergame.com??? if u do u kno how they got wildy outside edgeville bank???
wel i want my server to have tht…[/quote]

Indeed, The playerCombat class, Add wilderness ranges into there… such as.

int wildLvl(Player p) {
	return (p.absY - 3520)/8+1;
    }

That will create a wildLvl int witch you can use with something such as…

boolean isInWildRange(Player p) {
	Player p2 = Engine.players[p.attackPlayer]; 
	if(p.combatLevel > p2.combatLevel) {
	 if(p.combatLevel - p2.combatLevel <= wildLvl(p2)) {
		return true;
	 }
	} else if(p.combatLevel < p2.combatLevel) {
	   if(p2.combatLevel - p.combatLevel <= wildLvl(p2)) {
		return true;
	   }
	  } else if(p.combatLevel == p2.combatLevel) {
		return true;
                  }
    return false;
    }

So forth, And so on; You can make different attack method’s to your likings.

Read full topic
